title: openblas fails to build with Intel 18.0.1
body:
The error that I am getting is:
```
/home/certik/repos/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/icc -O2 -DMAX_STACK_ALLOC=2048 -wd981 -DF_INTERFACE_INTEL -fPIC -DNO_WARMUP -DMAX_CPU_NUMBER=32 -DASMNAME= -DASMFNAME=_ -DNAME=_ -DCNAME= -DCHAR_NAME=\"_\" -DCHAR_CNAME=\"\" -I..  -w -o linktest linktest.c ../libopenblas_sandybridge-r0.2.20.so -L/home/certik/intel18/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/5/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/5/../../../x86_64-linux-gnu/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/5/../../../../lib/ -L/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -L/lib/../lib64 -L/lib/../lib/ -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/ -L/usr/lib/../lib/ -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/5/../../../ -L/lib64 -L/lib/ -L/usr/lib  -lifport -lifcoremt -limf -lsvml -lm -lipgo -lirc -lpthread -lsvml -lc -lirc_s -ldl -lc  -lifcore && echo OK.
/tmp/icc5rLaOl.o: In function `main':
linktest.c:(.text+0x3945): undefined reference to `xerbla_array__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x394c): undefined reference to `chla_transtype__'

linktest.c:(.text+0x3984): undefined reference to `chetf2_rook__'

linktest.c:(.text+0x39b5): undefined reference to `clasyf_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39bc): undefined reference to `csytf2_rook__'

linktest.c:(.text+0x39ca): undefined reference to `csytrs_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39d1): undefined reference to `csytri_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39d8): undefined reference to `csycon_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39df): undefined reference to `csysv_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39e6): undefined reference to `dlasyf_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x39ed): undefined reference to `dsytf2_rook__'

linktest.c:(.text+0x3a25): undefined reference to `zhetri_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x3a2c): undefined reference to `zhetrs_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x3a33): undefined reference to `zhecon_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x3a3a): undefined reference to `zhesv_rook__'
linktest.c:(.text+0x3a41): undefined reference to `zlahef_rook__'
```

It builds with Intel 16.0.2.
